Posts.Title: My 2nd opinion at Major University leaf leaf

Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2007 01:08AM karcan wrote: It is so hard to have these up and down feelings. One minute to the next, everything can change. Just know that you aren't alone. We are all going through or have gone through the same situation. I am going for my MRI guided biopsy in two hours from now, so I know exactly how you are feeling.
Posts.Title: Feeling overwhelmed this a.m. and tired frd1083 karcan

Posts.Content: Mar 14, 2007 05:50PM karcan wrote: Have you had a cold or flu symptoms in the last few days? It could just be an infection. This happened to me when I had my MRI last month. They had me do a sonogram after the MRI because of a lymph node that looked different. By the time I went for the sonogram two days after the MRI, everything was fine. I did have a sore throat for a few days, so that was probably it. It doesn't hurt to have it checked out though, because you never know, and peace of mind is very important.
